mapper.select: select a.user_seq, a.user_id, b.place_imgs, b.place_seq, a.user_type from yonolja_user a, yonolja_place b where a.user_seq = b.user_seq order by b.place_seq
mapper.update: update yonolja_user set user_email=#{param2}, user_password=#{param3}, user_mobile=#{param4} where user_seq=#{param1}
